title: Is Silent Hill Making a Return? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.13.20
description:
Blessing and Greg talk about new Silent Hill(s) rumors, Dreams Beta Evaluation, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:06:00 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:06:21 - Is Silent Hill Making a Return?
00:18:43 - “How do you see this affecting Sony’s relationship with Kojima?” - Ignacio Rojas
00:22:16 - Media Molecule is launching Dreams Beta Evaluation
00:31:24 - Square Enix has an E3 Update
00:34:32 - February US sales down 29%
00:41:56 - Niantic’s introducing some changes to Pokémon GO
00:46:53 -  Ad
00:51:56 - Out today 
 Reader mail   -
00:58:23 - “Is there any chance for a last minute Animal Crossing and Doom: Eternal delay?” - BradenEggs
01:02:35 - Squad Up: Liam - Xbox - Muppetlead
01:14:29 - Squad Up: https://bit.ly/3a0K2yg 
01:06:31 - You‘re Wrong
01:09:10 - Post Show
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - Greg & Blessing
Tuesday - Greg & Imran
Wednesday - Greg & Whitta
Thursday - Greg & Tim
Friday - Greg & Blessing
